1.content:
It was Monday morning, and Dylan could hardly manage to get out of bed. After several snoozes on the alarm clock he got out of bed and got dressed. His older sister Alyssa told him to get in the car already. After doing so they drove off to school.
After arriving at school Dylan went to his first class. He could hardly stay awake so he asked his teacher if he could go to the restroom and get some water. After arriving in the hall Dylan notices that the lockers seem to be taller than normal. After a minute or two he blacks out.
Waking up he feels disoriented and cold. He looks around to see the hallway, but everything was now huge. No. Everything wasn't huge but he seems to have shrunken down to 3 inches. "Shit" he thinks to himself.
1.title: Start

11.content: He notices someone walking down the hallway
11.title: Someone is coming

111.content: Alyssa was walking down the hall. From a far distance (actually about 10 feet) he noticed she was wearing her volleyball outfit today. He knew she was one of the prettiest girls in school, but also his sister. She was an athletic red head with the most amazing and toned features. She gets closer and notices Dylan
111.title: Alyssa

1111.content: She squats down to get a closer look. "OH MY GOD. WHAT THE FUCK!" She exclaims. Dylan attempts to calm her down but she ends up just picking him up and carrying him to where she was headed.
1111.title: Squats down to discover Dylan

info.brief_description: 16 year old Dylan shrinks at school
